Uses of Class
junit.JunitRepresentation

  • Packages that use JunitRepresentation 
    Package Description
    outputjunit
    Contains the main converter class and TemporaryModel as a temporary storage of converted elements.
    outputjunit.converter
    Contains converter classes converting the TestRepresentation to the JunitRepresentation
    outputjunit.files
    Contains classes creating files and directories for the test files

    • Uses of JunitRepresentation in outputjunit

      Methods in outputjunit that return JunitRepresentation 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) static JunitRepresentation OutputJunitConverter.convertTestToJunitRepresentation​(TestRepresentation testRepresentation)
      Converts a given TestRepresentation to a JunitRepresentation.

    • Uses of JunitRepresentation in outputjunit.converter

      Methods in outputjunit.converter with parameters of type JunitRepresentation 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) static JunitTestClass TestClassConverter.convertTestClass​(TestClass testClass, JunitPackage parent, JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation)
      Static method converting a given TestClass to a JunitTestClass and adds it to the given JunitPackage.
      static void TestClassConverter.convertTestClasses​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation, TemporaryModel tmpModel)
      Static methods to convert TestClasses of the TestPackages in the TemporaryModel to JunitTestClasses.

    • Uses of JunitRepresentation in outputjunit.files

      Methods in outputjunit.files with parameters of type JunitRepresentation 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void FileDirectoryCreator.createFileDirectories​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation, java.lang.String outputPath)
      Static method to create the directories for the test files of the given JunitRepresentation.
      Hereby, a directory for each package is created, which will contain its sub packages and test files.
      Creates the tests in a directory called [representation name]Structure, overwrites the directory, if it already exists.
      (package private) static void FileDirectoryCreator.createFileDirectory​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation, JunitParent junitParent, java.lang.String testFilePath)
      Static method to create a directory for a given JunitPackage.
      This method ignores all packages, which qualified name doesn't start with the name of the JunitRepresentation to exclude tests of external classes.
      static void TestFileCreator.createTestFiles​(JunitRepresentation junitRepresentation, java.lang.String outputPath)
      Create test class files for the given JunitRepresentation in the given output directory.
